name: Jogo Baixo Carbono
description:
Introduction to Jogo Baixo Carbono:

This party game is the full edutainment package with quizzes and mini-games to entertain the player but also teach some valuable lessons related to the environment.

Game currently only in Portuguese but the future version of the game will be having  language selection options with major language spoken all around the world to reach out the bigger audience mass.  Additional mini-games  are on the verse of development which increases the excitement and more fun to the game. 

This game project was developed within the scope of  3D game project curricular unit of ESTG-IPLeiria, Portugal.
